the sandaha welendapola soya ganima men ma merata the nishpadanayanhi pramithiya pilibandawa salakilimath wima the karmanthayata adalawa nirmanaya wana nithi wirodhi thaththwayan pilibandawa karunu sewima aadi wagakim rasak wawili karmantha amathyanshayata ayath wana shri lanka the mandalayata pawari thibe.
